title: ISR Asset Resource Planning
description: A planner must select the best ISR asset to find a mobile surface-to-air missile (SAM) launcher hidden in a forested area.

tasks.description: Analyze the intelligence on the target type and the terrain (dense forest).
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner understands the difficulty of finding a mobile, hidden target in foliage.

tasks.description: Query available ISR assets and their sensor capabilities (e.g., standard video, thermal, synthetic aperture radar).
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner gets a list of available assets and their sensor payloads.

tasks.description: Select a drone equipped with synthetic aperture radar (SAR), which can penetrate foliage, as the optimal asset for the mission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner makes the correct technical decision to use a SAR-equipped platform.
